title: Taylor Morrison CEO Talks Mergers and Labor
itunes:title: Taylor Morrison CEO Talks Mergers and Labor
description:
Sheryl Palmer, CEO at Taylor Morrison, discusses the home builder’s acquisition of William Lyon Homes and seeing consistency in the California and Texas housing markets. She also explains the state of employment in the sector.

Host: Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
